hero.title: United Super Brands
hero.subtitle: As a holding company of 4 different companies, we create a strong family

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: United Super Brands, as a holding company of 4 different companies, creates a stronger structure by combining the strengths of each of our companies.
about.visionText: By combining the strengths of our 4 companies that are leaders in their sectors, we provide our customers with the highest quality products and services. By working with the goal of excellence in each company's own area of expertise, we build a stronger future together.
about.visionText2: With our experienced teams and strong infrastructure, each of our companies is in a leading position in their own field.

unity.title: Strong Unity
unity.description: We create a stronger structure by combining the strengths of 4 different companies.

team.title: Experienced Team
team.description: Each of our companies has professional teams with years of experience.

network.title: Wide Network
network.description: We provide comprehensive solutions with the strong network of our 4 different companies.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: We guarantee the highest quality standards in each of our companies.

companies.title: Our Companies
companies.subtitle: 4 different companies operating under the United Super Brands umbrella, each specialized and leading in their own field.

albaFoodTrading.name: Alba Food Trading B.V.
albaFoodTrading.description: Leading company providing quality products and innovative solutions in the food sector.

albaFoodAmsterdam.name: Alba Food Amsterdam
albaFoodAmsterdam.description: Specialized food trading company based in Amsterdam, providing premium food products and services.

usbFood.name: USB Food
usbFood.description: Company specialized in food technologies and digital solutions.

dutcheys.name: Dutchey's Dutch Sweet Company
dutcheys.description: Specialized in Dutch sweets and confectionery products, bringing traditional Dutch flavors to the world.

cta.title: A Strong Family
cta.subtitle: We build a stronger future together with our 4 companies.

footer.description: As a holding company of 4 different companies, we create a stronger structure by combining the strengths of each of our companies.
